Compatible with iOS 9 - 10

SmartLowPower automates the activation of Low Power and Airplane mode for you which helps saving battery. There are many options to configure when each of the modes should be activated. Both can also be activated when the device is charging to speed up the charging process. Options available:

Low Power Mode:
- Device Locked / Unlocked
- Battery below Percentage (optional: only when locked)
- Charging

Airplane Mode:
- Battery below Percentage (optional: only when locked)
- Charging

There is also an extra feature which lets you disable the annoying 30s auto-lock timer in Low Power mode or when the device is charging.

Now also features a FlipSwitch toggle to enable or disable the tweak so you can manually activate Low Power mode easily. For your convenience, there's also an option to automatically enable Low Power Mode when you disable the tweak via FlipSwitch

Configure options from Settings.

If you like, please

- Add a FlipSwitch toggle to easily enable/disable the tweak which allows manual Low Power mode activation
- Option to automatically enable Low Power mode when disabling the tweak via FlipSwitch
